description:
With no way to complete her mission, Karin is ordered to return to the future. But it`s an order she has to refuse, because it`s not over yet. If she returns now, Junta will be forced to fight Ryuji, and that could very well mean the boy she loves may die! Rushing to Ryuji`s manor, Karin finds that Ryuji is anything but himself, and that her worries are all too real.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Guai a te se diventi il mega playboy!!
メガプレになっちゃダメ!!
